channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Corrupt Media Obsess Over Luigi Mangione After Memory Holing Trump’s Would-Be Assassins
item.description: The media builds a mystique around an alleged murderer while ignoring two gunmen who targeted a presidential candidate.

item.title: Dems Call Trump A Threat To Democracy Because He Can Turn Their Lawfare Back On Them
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is apparently a threat to democracy because he has the power to use the DOJ the way Democrats did against him.

item.title: The Musk Factor
item.description: Musk brings a boundless optimism and can-do verve, and he’s a healthy new ingredient to Trump’s populist mix.

item.title: In the age of Slack and Zoom, Jensen Huang still swears by email to keep tabs on every corner of Nvidia
item.description: "I’m looking to detect the weak signals. It’s easy to pick up the strong signals, but I want to intercept them when they are weak."

item.title: Landmark Transgender SCOTUS Case Could Reshape A Doctor’s Oath To ‘Do No Harm’
item.description: Transgender treatments make doctors adjust their risk assessment to accept iatrogenic side effects as a necessary cost of treating patients.
